DOC.brief_summary: The comparison effect four different treatment protocol : Antagonist/letrozole protocol , microdose flare-up protocol , Antagonist/clomiphene protocol , Antagonist IVF outcomes poor responder undergo vitro fertilization ; prospective randomized-controlled study .
DOC.brief_title: The Comparison Effect Four Different Treatment Protocols IVF Outcomes Poor Responders Undergoing Vitro Fertilization .
DOC.criteria: Criteria definition poor responder include least one follow 1 . Anti müllerian hormone < 1.1 ng/ml and/or previous poor ovarian response ( ≤3 oocytes conventional stimulation protocol ) . 2 . Primary infertile patient 3 . BMI≤30 kg/m2 include study .
